headline: Does Tyson Foods (TSN) Offer Value After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Tyson Foods is priced attractively right now, this article walks through the numbers so you can judge the value for yourself. The stock last closed at US$56.20, with returns of 4.9% over the past year, a 3.2% decline year to date, and a 4.1% decline over the last week. Recent headlines around Tyson Foods have focused on its position as a major US meat producer, ongoing attention on input costs such as feed and energy, and how consumer demand for protein fits into...
